xwikidoc.name: A-Google

xwikidoc.title: Architecture test: Google
xwikidoc.content:
{{info}}**Task:** Imagine or execute the following scenario: * Navigate to www.google.com * Login with your google account * Do a random search
Provide a detailed presentation of what happens on the client, on the servers and during transport. * structure ideas: 5 minutes * tech discussion: up to 20 minutes {{/info}}
